titles.title: Firefighter Cancer Registry Reauthorization Act of 2023
Firefighter Cancer Registry Reauthorization Act of 2023
Firefighter Cancer Registry Reauthorization Act of 2023
Firefighter Cancer Registry Reauthorization Act of 2023
Firefighter Cancer Registry Reauthorization Act of 2023
Firefighter Cancer Registry Reauthorization Act of 2023
To reauthorize the Firefighter Cancer Registry Act of 2018.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by the Yeas and Nays: 28 - 0.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 51 - 0.
Reported by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 118-247.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 197.

action.text: Mr. Guthrie moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3821.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 413 - 7 (Roll no. 65).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
House Energy and Commerce
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Firefighter Cancer Registry Reauthorization Act of 2023
This act reauthorizes through FY2028 the National Firefighter Registry for Cancer. This is a voluntary registry maintained by the National Institute of Occupational Safety & Health that collects relevant health and occupational information to better understand and reduce cancers among firefighters.
